tc_game_scripts.script_contents: import random, string if ThisService.Variables["PrivatePassword"] == "": ThisService.Variables["PrivatePassword"] = ''.join(random.choice(string.ascii_uppercase + string.digits) for _ in range(10)) ThisService.Save()

tc_game_scripts.script_contents: import random, string if ThisService.Variables["PrivatePassword"] == "": ThisService.Variables["PrivatePassword"] = ''.join(random.choice(string.ascii_uppercase + string.digits) for _ in range(10)) ThisService.Save()

tc_game_scripts.description: Switch branch to either Staging or Public. Will not take effect before the server has been updated.
tc_game_scripts.script_contents:
ThisService.Variables['branch'] ThisService.Save()
Script.WriteToConsole('Branch switched to {}. Please run the Steam Update to update the server.'.format(ThisService.Variables['branch']))
tc_game_scripts.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="7" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2022-12-16 08:52:06" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="7" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2022-12-16 08:55:44" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="7" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2021-03-02 19:14:35" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="7" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2021-03-02 19:15:22" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_game_scripts.custom_prompt:
Everything about the map and players will be deleted.
This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to continue?

tc_game_scripts.script_contents:
import clr clr.AddReference('System.IO.Compression.FileSystem') clr.AddReference("TCAdmin.SDK") from System.IO import Directory, File from System.Net import WebClient from TCAdmin.SDK.Misc import CompressionTools from System import Environment, PlatformID
c=CompressionTools() Script.WriteToConsole('Checking if Valheim Plus is installed...')
ModZipFile="WindowsServer.zip" if Environment.OSVersion.Platform == PlatformID.Win32NT else "UnixServer.tar.gz"
# Check if uMod is installed if File.Exists(ThisService.RootDirectory + 'BepInEx/plugins/ValheimPlus.dll'): if File.Exists(ThisService.RootDirectory + ModZipFile): File.Delete(ThisService.RootDirectory + ModZipFile)
Script.WriteToConsole('Found Valheim Plus installation... Updating mod.') url = "https://github.com/valheimPlus/ValheimPlus/releases/latest/download/" + ModZipFile fileName = ThisService.RootDirectory + ModZipFile wc = WebClient() Script.WriteToConsole("Downloading File " + fileName + " from " + url +"...\n\n") wc.DownloadFile(url,fileName)
if File.Exists(ThisService.RootDirectory + ModZipFile): c.Decompress(ThisService.RootDirectory + ModZipFile, ThisService.RootDirectory) File.Delete(ThisService.RootDirectory + ModZipFile) else: Script.WriteToConsole('Valheim Plus not installed.')

tc_dynamic_form_items.description: Enter the SteamID64 of the player you want to add as an admin. You can get the SteamID64 from here: SteamID.co
